history.content:
Hello all. I hope that this message finds you well. I am currently a Sophomore EECS major and considering a minor. However, I am not entirely sure how realistic this idea is and was hoping for some advice from this community.

The minor that I am interested in is Mechanical Engineering. By next semester, I will have completed all of the lower division requirements for EECS and will be ready to take Upper Division curriculum. 

I currently have the idea that since I have 5 semesters left, I will be able to take one ME course each semester, possibly one during Summer,  and complete the minor in time. Is this possible or reasonable? 

Thank you for your time and I appreciate and welcome all constructive criticism.
history.subject: Too late to minor?
